info.description:
The backend
'> exposes an HTTP API, the same API is used by the frontend to do everything from saving dashboards, creating users and updating data sources.
info.title: HTTP API.

post.description:
Returns the result of the
'> search through access-control role assignments. You need to have a permission with action `teams.roles:read` on scope `teams:*` and a permission with action `users.roles:read` on scope `users:*`.
